scripts.ssl:generate:powershell: powershell -Command "$cert = New-SelfSignedCertificate -DnsName 'localhost' -CertStoreLocation 'cert:\\CurrentUser\\My'; $pwd = ConvertTo-SecureString -String 'temp123' -Force -AsPlainText; Export-PfxCertificate -Cert \"cert:\\CurrentUser\\My\\$($cert.Thumbprint)\" -FilePath \"$env:USERPROFILE\\temp.pfx\" -Password $pwd; openssl pkcs12 -in \"$env:USERPROFILE\\temp.pfx\" -nocerts -out \"$env:USERPROFILE\\key.pem\" -nodes -passin pass:temp123; openssl pkcs12 -in \"$env:USERPROFILE\\temp.pfx\" -clcerts -nokeys -out \"$env:USERPROFILE\\cert.pem\" -passin pass:temp123; Remove-Item \"$env:USERPROFILE\\temp.pfx\" -Force"
scripts.ssl:check: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const os=require('os'); const path=require('path'); const keyPath=path.join(os.homedir(), 'key.pem'); const certPath=path.join(os.homedir(), 'cert.pem'); console.log('🔍 SSL Certificate Status:'); console.log('Key file:', keyPath, fs.existsSync(keyPath) ? '✅ EXISTS' : '❌ NOT FOUND'); console.log('Cert file:', certPath, fs.existsSync(certPath) ? '✅ EXISTS' : '❌ NOT FOUND'); if(fs.existsSync(keyPath) && fs.existsSync(certPath)) { const key = fs.readFileSync(keyPath, 'utf8'); const cert = fs.readFileSync(certPath, 'utf8'); console.log('Key format:', (key.includes('BEGIN PRIVATE KEY') || key.includes('BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY')) ? '✅ VALID' : '❌ INVALID'); console.log('Cert format:', cert.includes('BEGIN CERTIFICATE') ? '✅ VALID' : '❌ INVALID'); }"
scripts.dev: npm run ssl:generate && cross-env USE_HTTPS=true nest start --watch
